-import { ipcMain } from "electron"
-import { GET_FILE_LIST } from "../../../../common/eventType"
-import { getDirectoryTree } from "../../../helper/getDirectoryTree"
+import { ipcMain } from 'electron'
+import { GET_DIR_TREE } from '../../../../common/eventType'
+import { getDirectoryTree } from '../../../helper/getDirectoryTree'
 
-
-
-export const onInterProcess = (openedDir:string) => {
-    ipcMain.handle(GET_FILE_LIST,()=>{
-        return getDirectoryTree(openedDir)
-    })
+export const onInterProcess = (openedDir: string) => {
+  ipcMain.handle(GET_DIR_TREE, () => {
+    return getDirectoryTree(openedDir)
+  })
 }

@@ -1,21 +1,21 @@
-import { ipcMain } from 'electron'
+import { BrowserWindow, ipcMain } from 'electron'
 import { windowsMap } from '../../..'
 import { GET_DIR_TREE, GET_FILE_LIST } from '../../../../common/eventType'
-import { Windows } from '../../../../common/interface'
 import { getDirectoryTree } from '../../../helper/getDirectoryTree'
 import { getFileList } from '../../../helper/getFileList'
 import { getWindow } from '../../../helper/getWindow'
 import { defaultPath } from '../../config'
 
-export const onInterProcess = (windows: Windows) => {
+export const onInterProcess = () => {
   ipcMain.handle(GET_DIR_TREE, (e) => {
     const window = getWindow(e)
-    if (window) windowsMap.get(window)
-    console.log(windowsMap.get(window))
-    return getDirectoryTree(defaultPath)
+    const path = windowsMap.get(window as BrowserWindow)
+    return getDirectoryTree(path || defaultPath)
   })
   ipcMain.handle(GET_FILE_LIST, (e) => {
-    const path = getWindow(e)
-    return getFileList(defaultPath)
+    const window = getWindow(e)
+    const path = windowsMap.get(window as BrowserWindow)
+
+    return getFileList(path || defaultPath)
   })
 }

+  ipcMain.handle(GET_SEARCH_RESUlT, (e, targetWord: string) => {
+    const window = getWindow(e)
+    const path = windowsMap.get(window as BrowserWindow)
+    const dfs = (searchPath: string) => {
+      if (lstatSync(searchPath).isDirectory()) dfs(searchPath)
+      const matchs = readFileSync(searchPath,'utf-8').split('\n')
+      console.log(matchs)
+    }
+    return '100'
+  })
 }
